creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: indigo band, 3"; indigo vertical rectangle has flap attached at waist, 11-1/2" including fringe, by 7-1/2"; flap has flora and fauna embroidery and sequins in multicolors on red; wide cross stitch border on three sides with 3" fringe of shades of pink and tan; cross stitch border includes floral and geometric plus Chinese characters at PL bottom; goemetric print lining in red and black
title: Baby Carrier
